curam.util.cache
Class CacheLoaderAdapter<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.cache.CacheLoaderAdapter<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - the cache key
V - the cached value
All Implemented Interfaces:
CacheLoader<K,V>
public abstract class CacheLoaderAdapter<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheLoader<K,V>

An adapter to simplify the development of cache loaders. It provides no operation implementations for CacheLoaderAdapter.init() and CacheLoaderAdapter.dispose() and CacheLoaderAdapter.loadAll(Set) is implemented using repeat calls to CacheLoader.load(Object).

          Constructor.

loadAll

public java.util.Map<K,V> loadAll(java.util.Set<K> keys)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
The default implementation uses repeat calls to CacheLoader.load(Object) to load the required data. If Cache.getAll(Set) or Cache.loadAll(Set) are invoked and performance is a concern, implement a more efficient way of loading the required data. If keys is null then nothing is done and null is returned.

Specified by:
loadAll in interface CacheLoader<K,V>
Parameters:
keys - keys
Returns:
loaded items
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurred during the load operation
See Also:
CacheLoader.loadAll(java.util.Set)
